TEI:
Kalittokai 76.
iḵtu “acca nīṭiṉum” (to.po.111) eṉṟataṉāṟ kūṭṭamuṇmai uṇarnta tōḻikku uṇmai kūṟutaṟku añciya accam nīṭṭittut talaivi kūṟiyatu. itu “tiṇaimayak kuṟutaluṅ kaṭinilai yilavē” eṉṉuñ cūttiravitiyāṉ (to.po.12), marutattuk kuṟiñci vantatu.
puṉaiyiḻai nōkkiyum puṉalāṭap puṟañcūḻntu
maṇivari taiiyunam milvantu vaṇaṅkiyu
niṉaiyupu varuntumin neṭuntakai tiṟattivvū
riṉaiyaḷeṉ ṟeṭuttōtaṟ kaṉaiyaiyō nīyeṉa
viṉavuti yāyiṉ viḷaṅkiḻāy kēḷiṉi;
cevviral civappūrac cēṭceṉṟā yeṉṟavaṉ
pauvanīrc cāykkoḻutip pāvaitan taṉaittaṟkō
kauvainō yuṟṟavar kāṇātu kaṭuttacol
lovvāveṉ ṟuṇarāynī yorunilaiyē yuraittatai;
oṭuṅkiyām pukalollēm peyartara vavaṉkaṇṭu
neṭuṅkaya malarvāṅki neṟittuttan taṉaittaṟkō
viṭuttavar virakiṉṟi yeṭuttacoṟ poyyākak
kaṭintatu milaiyāynī kaḻaṟiya vantatai;
varitēṟṟāy nīyeṉa vaṇaṅkiṟai yavaṉpaṟṟit
terivēyttōṭ karumpeḻutit toyyilcey taṉaittaṟkō
puripunam māyattār poyyāka veṭuttacol
luritteṉa vuṇarāynī yulamantāy pōṉṟatai;
eṉavāṅku,
aritiṉi yāyiḻā yatutēṟṟal puriporuṅ
kaṉṟunam vatuvaiyu ṇamarceyva tiṉṟīṅkē
tāṉayan tiruntativ vūrāyi ṉevaṉkolō
nāñceyaṟ pāla tiṉi.
